table.name: vtiger_isa
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_isa` ( `isaid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `policynumber` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `relatedclient` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `isatype` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `isaname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `startdate` date DEFAULT NULL, `unitvalue` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `numberofunits` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `currentamount` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_isacf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_isacf` ( `isaid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`isaid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
